"A Wild Easter 2016":
"This is an emergency alert for all ARKS.
We have received reports that Mechs and
Darkers are going on a rampage around
the Easter venue at the Lillipan Quarry.
If nothing is done, we will have to cancel the
event, and future missions will be affected.
All ARKS are to dispatch as soon as possible
and repel the enemies around the venue.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
"Remove the obstacles and head to the final area!"

"This is bad, this is really bad!
A ton of enemies just showed
up at the Easter venue!"

"Oh no, what now? I'm picking
up a super-strong reading from
the innermost part of the venue!"

"Everyone, work together
to defeat the enemies and
head for the innermost area!"
